name: Combine identity with reload (FX 56-)
description: Moves reload/stop buttons to the left of the address bar and optionally makes them appear only when hovered.

user.name: tulirebane
user.about: I no longer update my UI styles in this site, please check out my GitLab repo for the newest stuff!

additional_info:
Don't forget that you can still review security and site permissions by right clicking on the page and selecting "View page info", this style just removes the possibility of clicking the identity box itself (if you so choose). Goes well with:
  • style 121010
    • (disable hover feature here)
  • style 138269
  • style 137956
